si.title: උසාවියේ ලොහාන් රෝදවියට්
body_lines: අත්අඩංගුවට ගෙන ප්රශ්න කරන ලද හිටපු රාජ්ය ලොහාන් රත්වත්ත මහතා අද පෙරවරුවේ කොළඹ කොටුවේ මහේස්ත්රාත් අධිකරණයට ගෙන එන ලදී.. රීල්

en.title: Lohan Radhavatte in court
body_lines: Former Minister of State Lohan Ratwatte, who was arrested and interrogated, was brought to the Colombo Fort Magistrate's Court this morning.. Remble

summary_lines: Former Minister Lohan Ratwatte appeared in court today after arrest and interrogation. He was brought to the Colombo Fort Magistrate's Court this morning.
